Events that occurred on 4 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1923 - Actor Peter Vaughan is born.
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222e.
1960 - Actor Hugo Weaving is born.
1976 - Gervase Mathew, Inkling, dies.
1998 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 12 is published.
2009 - The Fourth Grand Council of the Sociedad Tolkien Peruana is held in Lima, Peru.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Frodo and Sam, rescued out of the fire, rest in Ithilien.
